question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: على أي ضفاف نهر يقع مركز مدينة أوبسالا بالسويد؟
answer: يقع مركز مدينة أوبسالا بالسويد على ضفاف نهر فيريس.
answer_translated_eng: The city centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the banks of the Ferris River.
